Would to God<S>3785</S> ye could bear<S>430</S> with me<S>3450</S> a little<S>3397</S> in my folly<S>877</S>: and<S>2532</S> indeed<S>235</S> bear<S>430</S> with me<S>3450</S>. <sup>indeed bear: or, indeed ye do bear with me</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I am jealous<S>2206</S> over you<S>5209</S> with godly<S>2316</S> jealousy<S>2205</S>: for<S>1063</S> I have espoused<S>718</S> you<S>5209</S> to one<S>1520</S> husband<S>435</S>, that I may present<S>3936</S> you as a chaste<S>53</S> virgin<S>3933</S> to Christ<S>5547</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I fear<S>5399</S>, lest<S>3381</S> by any means<S>4458</S>, as<S>5613</S> the serpent<S>3789</S> beguiled<S>1818</S> Eve<S>2096</S> through<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> subtilty<S>3834</S>, so<S>3779</S> your<S>5216</S> minds<S>3540</S> should be corrupted<S>5351</S> from<S>575</S> the simplicity<S>572</S> that is in<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> <S>3303</S> he that cometh<S>2064</S> preacheth<S>2784</S> another<S>243</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, whom<S>3739</S> we have<S>2784</S> not<S>3756</S> preached<S>2784</S>, or<S>2228</S> if ye receive<S>2983</S> another<S>2087</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, which<S>3739</S> ye have<S>2983</S> not<S>3756</S> received<S>2983</S>, or<S>2228</S> another<S>2087</S> gospel<S>2098</S>, which<S>3739</S> ye have<S>1209</S> not<S>3756</S> accepted<S>1209</S>, ye might<S>430</S> well<S>2573</S> bear with<S>430</S> him. <sup>with him: or, with me</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I suppose<S>3049</S> I was<S>5302</S> not a whit<S>3367</S> behind<S>5302</S> the very<S>5228</S> chiefest<S>3029</S> apostles<S>652</S>.
But<S>1161</S> though<S>1499</S> I be rude<S>2399</S> in speech<S>3056</S>, yet<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> in knowledge<S>1108</S>; but<S>235</S> we have been throughly<S>1722</S> <S>3956</S> made manifest<S>5319</S> among<S>1519</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
<S>2228</S> Have I committed<S>4160</S> an offence<S>266</S> in abasing<S>5013</S> myself<S>1683</S> that<S>2443</S> ye<S>5210</S> might be exalted<S>5312</S>, because<S>3754</S> I have preached<S>2097</S> to you<S>5213</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of God<S>2316</S> freely<S>1432</S>?
I robbed<S>4813</S> other<S>243</S> churches<S>1577</S>, taking<S>2983</S> wages<S>3800</S> of them, to<S>4314</S> do<S>1248</S> you<S>5216</S> service<S>1248</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when I was present<S>3918</S> with<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> wanted<S>5302</S>, I was<S>3756</S> chargeable<S>2655</S> to no man<S>3762</S>: for<S>1063</S> that which was lacking<S>5303</S> to me<S>3450</S> the brethren<S>80</S> which came<S>2064</S> from<S>575</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S> supplied<S>4322</S>: and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> things I have kept<S>5083</S> myself<S>1683</S> from being burdensome<S>4</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> so will I keep<S>5083</S> myself.
As the truth<S>225</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>,<S>3754</S> no man<S>3756</S> shall stop<S>4972</S> <S>5420</S> me<S>1519</S> <S>1691</S> of this<S>3778</S> boasting<S>2746</S> in<S>1722</S> the regions<S>2824</S> of Achaia<S>882</S>. <sup>no man: Gr. this boasting shall not be stopped in me</sup>
Wherefore<S>1302</S>? because<S>3754</S> I love<S>25</S> you<S>5209</S> not<S>3756</S>? God<S>2316</S> knoweth<S>1492</S>.
But<S>1161</S> what<S>3739</S> I do<S>4160</S>, that<S>2532</S> I will do<S>4160</S>, that<S>2443</S> I may cut off<S>1581</S> occasion<S>874</S> from them which desire<S>2309</S> occasion<S>874</S>; that<S>2443</S> wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> they glory<S>2744</S>, they may be found<S>2147</S> even<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> we<S>2249</S>.
For<S>1063</S> such<S>5108</S> are false apostles<S>5570</S>, deceitful<S>1386</S> workers<S>2040</S>, transforming themselves<S>3345</S> into<S>1519</S> the apostles<S>652</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>2532</S> no<S>3756</S> marvel<S>2298</S>; for<S>1063</S> Satan<S>4567</S> himself<S>846</S> is transformed<S>3345</S> into<S>1519</S> an angel<S>32</S> of light<S>5457</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> it is no<S>3756</S> great thing<S>3173</S> if<S>1499</S> his<S>846</S> ministers<S>1249</S> also<S>1499</S> be transformed<S>3345</S> as<S>5613</S> the ministers<S>1249</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S>; whose<S>3739</S> end<S>5056</S> shall be<S>2071</S> according<S>2596</S> to their<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S>.
I say<S>3004</S> again<S>3825</S>, Let<S>1380</S> no<S>3361</S> man<S>5100</S> think<S>1380</S> me<S>1511</S> <S>3165</S> a fool<S>878</S>; if otherwise<S>1490</S>, yet<S>2579</S> as<S>5613</S> a fool<S>878</S> receive<S>1209</S> me<S>3165</S>, that<S>2443</S> I<S>2504</S> may boast myself<S>2744</S> a<S>5100</S> little<S>3397</S>. <sup>receive: or, suffer</sup>
That which<S>3739</S> I speak<S>2980</S>, I speak<S>2980</S> it not<S>3756</S> after<S>2596</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, but<S>235</S> as<S>5613</S> it were foolishly<S>1722</S> <S>877</S>, in<S>1722</S> this<S>5026</S> confidence<S>5287</S> of boasting<S>2746</S>.
Seeing that<S>1893</S> many<S>4183</S> glory<S>2744</S> after<S>2596</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, I will glory<S>2744</S> also<S>2504</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye suffer<S>430</S> fools<S>878</S> gladly<S>2234</S>, seeing ye yourselves are<S>5607</S> wise<S>5429</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye suffer<S>430</S>, if a man<S>1536</S> bring<S>2615</S> you<S>5209</S> into bondage<S>2615</S>, if a man<S>1536</S> devour<S>2719</S> you, if a man<S>1536</S> take<S>2983</S> of you, if a man<S>1536</S> exalt himself<S>1869</S>, if a man<S>1536</S> smite<S>1194</S> you<S>5209</S> on<S>1519</S> the face<S>4383</S>.
I speak<S>3004</S> as concerning<S>2596</S> reproach<S>819</S>, as<S>5613</S> though<S>3754</S> we<S>2249</S> had been weak<S>770</S>. Howbeit<S>1161</S> whereinsoever<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> <S>302</S> any<S>5100</S> is bold<S>5111</S>, (I speak<S>3004</S> foolishly<S>1722</S> <S>877</S>,) I am bold<S>5111</S> also<S>2504</S>.
Are they<S>1526</S> Hebrews<S>1445</S>? so am I<S>2504</S>. Are they<S>1526</S> Israelites<S>2475</S>? so am I<S>2504</S>. Are they<S>1526</S> the seed<S>4690</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>? so am I<S>2504</S>.
Are they<S>1526</S> ministers<S>1249</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>? (I speak<S>2980</S> as a fool<S>3912</S>) I<S>1473</S> am more<S>5228</S>; in<S>1722</S> labours<S>2873</S> more abundant<S>4056</S>, in<S>1722</S> stripes<S>4127</S> above measure<S>5234</S>, in<S>1722</S> prisons<S>5438</S> more frequent<S>4056</S>, in<S>1722</S> deaths<S>2288</S> oft<S>4178</S>.
Of<S>5259</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> five times<S>3999</S> received I<S>2983</S> forty<S>5062</S> stripes save<S>3844</S> one<S>3391</S>.
Thrice<S>5151</S> was I beaten with rods<S>4463</S>, once<S>530</S> was I stoned<S>3034</S>, thrice<S>5151</S> I suffered shipwreck<S>3489</S>, a night and a day<S>3574</S> I have been<S>4160</S> in<S>1722</S> the deep<S>1037</S>;
In journeyings<S>3597</S> often<S>4178</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> of waters<S>4215</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> of robbers<S>3027</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> by<S>1537</S> mine own countrymen<S>1085</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> by<S>1537</S> the heathen<S>1484</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> in<S>1722</S> the city<S>4172</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2047</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> in<S>1722</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, in perils<S>2794</S> among<S>1722</S> false brethren<S>5569</S>;
In<S>1722</S> weariness<S>2873</S> and<S>2532</S> painfulness<S>3449</S>, in<S>1722</S> watchings<S>70</S> often<S>4178</S>, in<S>1722</S> hunger<S>3042</S> and<S>2532</S> thirst<S>1373</S>, in<S>1722</S> fastings<S>3521</S> often<S>4178</S>, in<S>1722</S> cold<S>5592</S> and<S>2532</S> nakedness<S>1132</S>.
Beside<S>5565</S> those things that are without<S>3924</S>, that which<S>3588</S> cometh upon<S>1999</S> me<S>3450</S> daily<S>2250</S>,<S>2596</S> the care<S>3308</S> of all<S>3956</S> the churches<S>1577</S>.
Who<S>5101</S> is weak<S>770</S>, and<S>2532</S> I am<S>770</S> not<S>3756</S> weak<S>770</S>? who<S>5101</S> is offended<S>4624</S>, and<S>2532</S> I<S>1473</S> burn<S>4448</S> not<S>3756</S>?
If<S>1487</S> I must needs<S>1163</S> glory<S>2744</S>, I will glory<S>2744</S> of the things which concern<S>3588</S> mine<S>3450</S> infirmities<S>769</S>.
The God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> Father<S>3962</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> blessed<S>2128</S> for<S>1519</S> evermore<S>165</S>, knoweth<S>1492</S> that I<S>3754</S> lie<S>5574</S> not<S>3756</S>.
In<S>1722</S> Damascus<S>1154</S> the governor<S>1481</S> under Aretas<S>702</S> the king<S>935</S> kept<S>5432</S> the city<S>4172</S> of the Damascenes<S>1153</S> with a garrison<S>5432</S>, desirous<S>2309</S> to apprehend<S>4084</S> me<S>3165</S>:
And<S>2532</S> through<S>1223</S> a window<S>2376</S> in<S>1722</S> a basket<S>4553</S> was I let down<S>5465</S> by<S>1223</S> the wall<S>5038</S>, and<S>2532</S> escaped<S>1628</S> his<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>.
